Careers.Objectives: Basic Marine, accomplish missions and neutralize enemies.
Careers.Acceptees: Around 50% (Basic Marine acceptance, as Rifleman is basic)

Careers.Objectives: Provide support for the platoon, using LMG's and SAW's to cover other riflemen.
Careers.Acceptees: Around 50% (Basic Marine acceptance, as Machine Gunner is basic)

Careers.Objectives: Scout ahead for enemies and take out by a distance; identify targets and raids.
Enforce military law on bases and FOB's, including crimes such as friendly fire.
Special forces, deploy behind enemy lines, amphibious light infantry warfare.
Careers.Pay: Average 30,000 annually, adds with rank. (Basic pay as no pay charts have been released by the Marine Corps.
